oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !kweiten ta ||ken (Rachel) (VI)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sentences on some |xam who visited !kweiten ta ||ken's husband =kasin, and where they come from. Words in the Katkop dialect, from =kasin (B XXV. 2355-2360), from !kweiten ta //ken (L VI.-1. 3882, 3859-3897), and from Dia!kwain (L V.-6. 4434 and 4435, 8. 4615 rev., 9. 4653 rev., etc.). 1) The page numbers in this book (VI-1) are duplicates of those in notebook IV-4, 2) p.3896v: names of |xam who visited =kasin (!kweiten ta ||ken's husband), 3) This story is found in Book VI-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: by !kweiten ta ||ken
